ancestry.name: Dragonic
ancestry.description: Bearers of this ancestry inherit the power of dragons, increasing their attack and resistance to fire.

ancestry.description: Bearers of this ancestry grow stronger based on the damage they deal, at the cost of their own health.
ancestry.effect: Deals 15% additional damage but loses 5% health per attack

ancestry.description: Blessed by the gods, bearers of this ancestry gain healing and purification abilities.
ancestry.effect: Increases healing received by 30% and purifies negative effects every 3 actions

ancestry.name: Runic
ancestry.description: Bearers of runes master ancient energy, enhancing their defense and the duration of magical effects.
ancestry.effect: Increases defense by 15% and extends beneficial effects by 2 turns

ancestry.name: Beastial
ancestry.description: Heirs of the wild, these bearers increase their speed and physical power as the battle progresses.
ancestry.effect: Gains +2 attack and +1 speed per turn
